snippet.title: Caretaker Sacrifice test gameplay (WORK IN PROGRESS)
snippet.description:
Caretaker Sacrifice takes place some time before the events in the main game Caretaker Retribution where two military astronauts take on a Star Killer.

This video just shows off some of the work-in-progress footage of the gameplay so far.

Caretaker Sacrifice will be out soon on PC, Mac, Linux and Oculus Rift VR.
